mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.nickname FROM follows f JOIN members m ON f.following_uid = m.member_uid WHERE m.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' AND m.role = 'MEMBER' AND f.follower_uid = ( SELECT member_uid FROM members WHERE member_id = #{ memberId } );

SELECT p.writer_uid, m.nickname, p.title FROM posts p JOIN members m ON p.writer_uid = m.member_uid WHERE m.activity_status = 'ACTIVE' AND m.role = 'MEMBER' AND p.is_deleted = false AND p.writer_uid = ( SELECT member_uid FROM members WHERE member_id = #{ writerId } ) ORDER BY p.created_at DESC
